headline: Mexico Remittances Plunge as Trump Cracks Down on Migrants

headline: Goldman Sachs sees OPEC+ raising oil output by 0.41 mb/d in August
summary: Goldman Sachs anticipates the eight country OPEC+ oil group will implement a final 0.41 million barrels per day (mb/d) production increase in August, the bank said in a note dated Sunday. "Relatively tight spot oil fundamentals, beats in hard global activity data, and seasonal summer support to oil demand suggest that the expected demand slowdown is unlikely to be sharp enough to stop raising production when deciding on August production levels on July 6th," Goldman Sachs said in a note.
